timeline.message: Updated petstore example, removed missing files
Updated petstore example, removed missing files
Updated PHP version to match composer.json
Add samples generation config with OAS3 input spec

timeline.bodyText:
I'm checking your PR locally right now.
Generation fails with:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not generate supporting file 'SupportingFile:
	templateFile: storage/framework/testing/.gitignore
	folder: lib/storage/framework/testing
	canOverwrite: true
	destinationFilename: .gitignore
Did you forget to rename templates gitignore to .gitignore?
What was the purpose of that renaming?
timeline.author: ybelenko

replies.bodyText: Ah, no, that was a discrepancy between new changes in master and the actual tarball provided by Laravel. Now that I can generate the samples I'll get those cleaned up.
replies.author: dragonmantank

replies.bodyText:
I think gitignore without extension is more safe for template files because it:

Doesn't actually ignore anything while it's template.
Is visible file on MacOS. (dot extension used for hidden files)
replies.author: ybelenko

replies.bodyText: No complaints from me, I'm happy to follow the convention. I just had them as .gitignore in the templates to save update time later, but I've got no qualms about keeping them as gitignore.
replies.author: dragonmantank

timeline.message: Fixed gitignore compile errors, updated to newest petstore example
Fixed gitignore compile errors, updated to newest petstore example
